abstract: Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto said on Monday it has raised its stake in Ivanhoe Mines to 34.9 percent, following the conversion of a matured convertible credit facility, Reuters reported.
snippet: Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto said on Monday it has raised its stake in Ivanhoe Mines to 34.9 percent, following the conversion of a matured convertible credit facility, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The Anglo-Australian miner Rio Tinto said on Monday it has raised its stake in Ivanhoe Mines to 34.9 percent, following the conversion of a matured convertible credit facility, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Said to Raise Stake 34.9% in Ivanhoe
